colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @014B (CES BKRA SHIS BRJOD NAS ME TOG GI CHAR 'BEBS BAR BYA'O, ,DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG SKYA RENGS DKAR PO ZHES BYA BA 'DI MCHED GROGS AE MCHI BKA' BCUS PA DANG NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN GNYIS GZHAN LA PHAN PA SAM GYIS YUS 'DI DKAR ME LHA MCHOD CING GA-YANG BLANG BA'I BKRA 'JUG KYANG LHA BSKYED PA MCHOD PA BYIN RLABS SOGS MED PA'I SOG YIG TSIG LHANG CAN GYI LUG 'DZIN PA BKA' SNANG MOD, ,RANG RE LA LHA BSKYED ME MCHOD ZHIG BYED DGOS ZHES BSKUL NGO @015A *, ,MCHOG PAR SBYIN BSREG GI THAB BSKYED DANG, SLOB DPON PADMA'I MDZAD PA'I STENG DU GA-YANG 'GUGS CHEN PO'I GA-YANG 'GUGS BYED KYI TSIG BKA' ZHIG BSDUS NAS, RAB 'BYAMS PA NGAG DBANG BSOD NAMS KYI MDZAD PA'I STENG DU, NYER SPYOD LNGA SPEL TSIG DANG BCAS LUG GI BRANG DANG MAR KHU DAR MCHOD 'BUL NI, NOM CHI K'UO SHR'I CHOS RJE BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS SUG BRIS SO, ,'DI LTAR BGYIS PA'I NONGS PA CI MCHIS NA, BLA MA LHA LA BSHAGS SHING BZOD PAR GSOL, ,LEGS CHA CUNG ZAD MCHIS PAS GANG THOB DGES, ,'GRO BA RNAMS LA PHAN PA'I RGYU GYUR CIG , ,,)
